original_text: The people of Israel called the bread manna. It was white like coriander seed and tasted like wafers made with honey.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속이 그 이름을 만나라 하였으며 깟씨 같이 희고 맛은 꿀 섞은 과자 같았더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Israel called the bread manna
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 그 빵을 만나라고 불렀다

sentences.original_text: It was white like coriander seed
and tasted like wafers made with honey
